verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh, In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> le-mal-Chut of the reign בֵּלְאשַׁצַּ֣ר <S%H1112><s%> be-le-shatz-Tzar Belshazzar הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; of king חָז֞וֹן <S%H2377><s%> cha-Zon a vision נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah appeared אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni to me דָנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, unto me [even unto] me Daniel אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> han-nir-'Ah that which appeared אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me בַּתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8462><s%> bat-te-chil-Lah. unto me at the first

וָֽאֶרְאֶה֮ <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh And I saw בֶּחָזוֹן֒ <S%H2377><s%> be-cha-zOn in a vision וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בִּרְאֹתִ֔י <S%H7200><s%> bir-'o-Ti, and it came to pass when I saw וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni myself בְּשׁוּשַׁ֣ן <S%H7800><s%> be-shu-Shan that I [was] at Shushan הַבִּירָ֔ה <S%H1002><s%> hab-bi-Rah, [in] the palace אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּעֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> be-'ei-Lam of Elam הַמְּדִינָ֑ה <S%H4082><s%> ham-me-di-Nah; which [is] in the province וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh and I saw בֶּֽחָז֔וֹן <S%H2377><s%> be-cha-Zon, in a vision וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni myself הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- was beside אוּבַ֥ל <S%H180><s%> 'u-Val and I was by the river אוּלָֽי׃ <S%H195><s%> 'u-Lai. of Ulai

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa Then I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, and saw וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, a עֹמֵ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med and behold there stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאֻבָ֖ל <S%H180><s%> ha-'u-Val the river וְל֣וֹ ve-Lo קְרָנָ֑יִם <S%H7161><s%> ke-ra-Na-yim; which had [two] horns וְהַקְּרָנַ֣יִם <S%H7161><s%> ve-hak-ke-ra-Na-yim and the [two] horns גְּבֹה֗וֹת <S%H1364><s%> ge-vo-Hot, [were] high וְהָאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ve-ha-'a-Chat but one גְּבֹהָ֣ה <S%H1364><s%> ge-vo-Hah [was] higher מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- than הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit, than the other וְהַ֨גְּבֹהָ֔ה <S%H1364><s%> ve-Hag-ge-vo-Hah, and the higher עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lah came up בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> ba-'a-cha-ro-Nah. last

רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאַ֡יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil the ram מְנַגֵּחַ֩ <S%H5055><s%> me-nag-ge-aCh pushing יָ֨מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah westward וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> ve-tza-Fo-nah and northward וָנֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> va-Neg-bah, and southward וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol no חַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> chai-yOt so that no beasts לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no יַֽעַמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du might stand לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein nor מַצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> matz-Tzil him neither [was there any] that could deliver מִיָּד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Do; out of his hand וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah but he did כִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <S%H7522><s%> chir-tzo-No according to his will וְהִגְדִּֽיל׃ <S%H1431><s%> ve-hig-Dil. and became great

וַאֲנִ֣י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti become מֵבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> me-Vin, And as I was considering וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold צְפִיר־ <S%H6842><s%> tze-fir- goat הָֽעִזִּים֙ <S%H5795><s%> ha-'iz-Zim behold an he בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <S%H4628><s%> ham-ma-'a-Rav from the west עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei on the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the whole earth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein without נוֹגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> no-Ge-a' and touched בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; not the ground וְהַ֨צָּפִ֔יר <S%H6842><s%> ve-Hatz-tza-Fir, and the goat קֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> Ke-ren horn חָז֖וּת <S%H2380><s%> cha-Zut [had] a notable בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between עֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav. between his eyes

וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo, And he came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- up הָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil to the ram בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> Ba-'al that had הַקְּרָנַ֔יִם <S%H7161><s%> hak-ke-ra-Na-yim, [two] horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֔יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti, which I had seen עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med standing לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאֻבָ֑ל <S%H180><s%> ha-'u-Val; the river וַיָּ֥רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vai-Ya-rotz and ran אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about בַּחֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> ba-cha-Mat unto him in the fury כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3581><s%> ko-Cho. of his power

וּרְאִיתִ֞יו <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Tiv And I saw מַגִּ֣יעַ׀ <S%H5060><s%> mag-Gi-a' him come אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel close unto הָאַ֗יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, the ram וַיִּתְמַרְמַ֤ר <S%H4843><s%> vai-yit-mar-Mar and he was moved with choler אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav at וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach against him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> ha-'A-yil, the ram וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> vay-shab-Ber and brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei his two קְרָנָ֔יו <S%H7161><s%> ke-ra-Nav, horns וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had כֹ֛חַ <S%H3581><s%> Cho-ach and there was no power בָּאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> ba-'A-yil in the ram לַעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> la-'a-Mod to stand לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; before וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤הוּ <S%H7993><s%> vai-yash-li-Che-hu him but he cast him down אַ֙רְצָה֙ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tzah to the ground וַֽיִּרְמְסֵ֔הוּ <S%H7429><s%> vai-yir-me-Se-hu, and stamped וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- none הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had מַצִּ֛יל <S%H5337><s%> matz-Tzil upon him and there was none that could deliver לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil the ram מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Do. out of his hand

וּצְפִ֥יר <S%H6842><s%> u-tze-Fir Therefore the he הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> ha-'iz-Zim goat הִגְדִּ֣יל <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dil great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; waxed very וּכְעָצְמ֗וֹ <S%H6105><s%> u-che-'a-tze-Mo, and when he was strong נִשְׁבְּרָה֙ <S%H7665><s%> nish-be-Rah was broken הַקֶּ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> hak-Ke-ren horn הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah, the great וַֽתַּעֲלֶ֜נָה <S%H5927><s%> vat-ta-'a-Le-nah and for it came up חָז֤וּת <S%H2380><s%> cha-Zut notable ones אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-ha, place לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-Ba' toward the four רוּח֥וֹת <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chot winds הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- Out הָאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat And out of one מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, of them יָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza of them came forth קֶֽרֶן־ <S%H7161><s%> ke-ren- horn אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat of one מִצְּעִירָ֑ה <S%H4704><s%> mitz-tze-'i-Rah; a little וַתִּגְדַּל־ <S%H1431><s%> vat-tig-dal- great יֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Ye-ter which waxed exceeding אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev toward the south וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- toward הַמִּזְרָ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> ham-miz-Rach and toward the east וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and toward הַצֶּֽבִי׃ <S%H6643><s%> hatz-Tze-vi. and toward the pleasant

וַתִּגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> vat-tig-Dal And it waxed great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- up צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va [even] to the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וַתַּפֵּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vat-tap-Pel and it cast down אַ֛רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah to the ground מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַצָּבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va [some] of the host וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- and some הַכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <S%H3556><s%> hak-ko-cha-Vim and of the stars וַֽתִּרְמְסֵֽם׃ <S%H7429><s%> Vat-tir-me-Sem. and stamped

וְעַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad even שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- [himself] even to the prince הַצָּבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va of the host הִגְדִּ֑יל <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dil; Yea he magnified וּמִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> u-mi-Men-nu at; הֵרִים he-rim כהוּרַ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> hu-Ram bring up קהַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid, and by him the daily וְהֻשְׁלַ֖ךְ <S%H7993><s%> ve-hush-Lach was cast down מְכ֥וֹן <S%H4349><s%> me-Chon and the place מִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Sho. of his sanctuary

וְצָבָ֛א <S%H6635><s%> ve-tza-Va And an host תִּנָּתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> tin-na-Ten was given עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- along הַתָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid [him] against the daily בְּפָ֑שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> be-Fa-sha'; [sacrifice] by reason of transgression וְתַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> ve-tash-Lech and it cast down אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met the truth אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, to the ground וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-se-Tah and it practised וְהִצְלִֽיחָה׃ <S%H6743><s%> ve-hitz-Li-chah. and prospered

וָאֶשְׁמְעָ֥ה <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-me-'Ah Then I heard אֶֽחָד־ <S%H259><s%> 'e-chod- one קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh saint מְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Ber; speaking וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said אֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and another קָד֜וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh saint לַפַּֽלְמוֹנִ֣י <S%H6422><s%> lap-pal-mo-Ni unto that certain הַֽמְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> ham-dab-Ber, [saint] which spake עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֞י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How הֶחָז֤וֹן <S%H2377><s%> he-cha-Zon How long [shall be] the vision הַתָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid [concerning] the daily וְהַפֶּ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> ve-hap-Pe-sha' [sacrifice] and the transgression שֹׁמֵ֔ם <S%H8074><s%> sho-Mem, of desolation תֵּ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> tet to give וְקֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> ve-Ko-desh both the sanctuary וְצָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> ve-tza-Va and the host מִרְמָֽס׃ <S%H4823><s%> mir-Mas. tread -ing

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against עֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev evenings בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker, mornings אַלְפַּ֖יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim unto me Unto two thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Losh and three מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot; hundred וְנִצְדַּ֖ק <S%H6663><s%> ve-nitz-Dak be cleansed קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. then shall the sanctuary
